name: html-layout-parser
description: High-performance HTML layout parser compiled to WebAssembly. Supports multi-font management, CSS separation, and multiple output modes for Canvas rendering.

scripts.build: tsup && pnpm run copy:wasm && pnpm run copy:bundles
scripts.copy:wasm: cp ../../wasm-output/html_layout_parser.wasm dist/ && cp ../../wasm-output/html_layout_parser.mjs dist/html_layout_parser.mjs && cp ../../wasm-output/html_layout_parser.cjs dist/html_layout_parser.cjs && if [ -f ../../wasm-output/html_layout_parser.d.ts ]; then cp ../../wasm-output/html_layout_parser.d.ts dist/; fi && if [ -f ../../wasm-output/html_layout_parser_types.d.ts ]; then cp ../../wasm-output/html_layout_parser_types.d.ts dist/; fi
scripts.copy:bundles: pnpm run copy:web && pnpm run copy:node && pnpm run copy:worker
scripts.copy:web: mkdir -p web && cp dist/html_layout_parser.mjs web/ && cp dist/html_layout_parser.cjs web/ && cp dist/html_layout_parser.wasm web/ && cp dist/web.js web/index.js && cp dist/web.d.ts web/index.d.ts && if [ -f dist/html_layout_parser.d.ts ]; then cp dist/html_layout_parser.d.ts web/; fi && if [ -f dist/html_layout_parser_types.d.ts ]; then cp dist/html_layout_parser_types.d.ts web/; fi
scripts.copy:node: mkdir -p node && cp dist/html_layout_parser.mjs node/ && cp dist/html_layout_parser.cjs node/ && cp dist/html_layout_parser.wasm node/ && cp dist/node.js node/index.js && cp dist/node.d.ts node/index.d.ts && if [ -f dist/html_layout_parser.d.ts ]; then cp dist/html_layout_parser.d.ts node/; fi && if [ -f dist/html_layout_parser_types.d.ts ]; then cp dist/html_layout_parser_types.d.ts node/; fi
scripts.copy:worker: mkdir -p worker && cp dist/html_layout_parser.mjs worker/ && cp dist/html_layout_parser.cjs worker/ && cp dist/html_layout_parser.wasm worker/ && cp dist/worker.js worker/index.js && cp dist/worker.d.ts worker/index.d.ts && if [ -f dist/html_layout_parser.d.ts ]; then cp dist/html_layout_parser.d.ts worker/; fi && if [ -f dist/html_layout_parser_types.d.ts ]; then cp dist/html_layout_parser_types.d.ts worker/; fi
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build

author: maomao123 <nwyzx126@126.com>
